SCTX:
Begin da_forkScript

Short OnPCEquip

if ( GetJournalIndex "DA_Sheogorath" < 10 )
return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "DA_Sheogorath" >= 10 )
	if ( "netch_giant_unique"->OnDeath == 1 )
		If ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
			Journal "DA_Sheogorath" 60
		elseif ( OnPCEquip != 1 )
			Journal "DA_Sheogorath" 55
		endif
		
	endif
endif

End
